properties.description: This pipeline is used to extract data from Salesforce API and Ingest data into snowflake

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart
activities.description: Store procedure to log start pipeline

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: get the metadata of SFDC datasets from orchestration and control tables

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
    om.application_name,
	om.dataset_name,
	om.dataset_group,
	om.parameter_json,
    ctrl.table_name,
    om.server_name,
    om.server_path,
    om.filename,
    om.data_filename,
    om.field_delimiter,
    om.container_name,
    om.archival_blob_name,
    om.stage_blob_name,
    om.blob_trigger_name,
    om.data_level,
    om.active_ind,
    om.parent_id,
    om.pattern_type,
    ctrl.dynamic_partition_ind,
    ctrl.partition_column,
    ctrl.incr_column_name,
    ctrl.last_incr_value,
	case
		when om.server_path = 'Master' then  concat('select ',select_columns,' from ',ctrl.table_name,' where ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
		when om.server_path = 'SQL' then
			case when lower(ctrl.table_name) like '% where %' then concat(ctrl.table_name,' and ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT)
				 else concat(ctrl.table_name,' where ',ctrl.FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT) 
			end
	end as extraction_query,
	case
        when om.server_path = 'Master' and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'') then concat('select max(',ctrl.incr_column_name,') as max_incr_value from ',ctrl.table_name,' where ',ctrl.where_clause_FOR_MAX)
		when om.server_path = 'SQL' and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'') then concat('select max(',ctrl.incr_column_name,') as max_incr_value from (',ctrl.table_name,') as p')
		ELSE 'Select NULL as max_incr_value'
	end as max_incr_value_query
from dbo.khc_orchestration_metadata om inner join
( Select
    parent_id,
    table_name,
    dynamic_partition_ind,
    partition_column,
    where_clause,
    incr_column_name,
    last_incr_value,
	select_columns,
    case
        when (where_clause is null or trim(where_clause)='') and (incr_column_name is null or trim(incr_column_name)='') then '1=1'
        when (where_clause is not null and trim(where_clause)<>'') and (incr_column_name is null or trim(incr_column_name)='') then where_clause
        when (where_clause is null or trim(where_clause)='') and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'' and trim(last_incr_value) <> '' and last_incr_value is not null) then concat(incr_column_name,' <= FETCH_SFDC_MAX_EXTR_VAL and ',incr_column_name,' > ',last_incr_value)
        when (where_clause is not null and trim(where_clause)<>'') and (incr_column_name is not null and trim(incr_column_name)<>'' and trim(last_incr_value) <> '' and last_incr_value is not null) then concat(incr_column_name,' <= FETCH_SFDC_MAX_EXTR_VAL and ',incr_column_name,' > ',last_incr_value ,' and ',where_clause)
		else '1=1'
    END as FINAL_WHERE_FOR_EXT,
	CASE when (where_clause is null or trim(where_clause)='') then '1=1' else where_clause END where_clause_FOR_MAX
from dbo.khc_data_extract_control_table
) ctrl
on om.parent_id = ctrl.parent_id
where len(trim(om.server_name)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.application_name)) > 0
  and len(trim(ctrl.table_name)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.server_path)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.filename)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.data_filename)) > 0
  and om.file_zip_ind in ('y', 'n')
  and om.file_checksum_ind in ('y', 'n')
  and len(trim(om.container_name)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.archival_blob_name)) > 0
  and len(trim(om.stage_blob_name)) > 0
  and ctrl.dynamic_partition_ind in ('y', 'n')
  and om.application_name like '@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}'
  and om.dataset_group like '@{pipeline().parameters.Dataset_Group}%'
  and om.server_name like 'LS_SALESFORCE_%'
  and om.data_level=1 and om.active_ind='y'
ORDER by om.parent_id ASC

activities.name: SFDC-Data-Extract
activities.description: Loop through all the Datasets of SFDC

activities.name: GET_THE_EXT_DATE
activities.description: Get the date of extraction in 'YYYYMMDD' format as in EST

activities.name: GET_max_incr_value
activities.description: capture max_incr_value of prev step and append Z in the end

activities.name: FETCH_MAX_VALUE
activities.description: Fetch max value of incremental Column in the  table

activities.name: FETCH_STAGE_FILE
activities.description: Get metadata of Stage Blob

activities.name: IF_DELETE_STAGE_FILES
activities.description: Delete files at staging location if present from earlier run

ifTrueActivities.name: DELETE_STAGE_FILES
ifTrueActivities.description: Delete previous extraction files from stage location

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivityAndPipelineFailed_DeleteStage
ifTrueActivities.description: Update delete stage location activity failure and pipeline failure in audit logs

activities.name: COPY_FILES_TO_STAGE
activities.description: Check the Execution Status and Delete files from Stage if exists and Copy the files to Archive & Stage Folders

activities.name: COPY_TO_STAGE
activities.description: Copy files from land to stage location for snowflake ingestion

activities.name: COPY_TO_ARCHIVE
activities.description: Copy data files to archive location from land

activities.name: CREATE_TRIGGER_FILE
activities.description: Create blob trigger files after data extract is complete

activities.name: UPDATE_INCR_LAST_VALUE
activities.description: Update latest max incremental value in data extract control table to fetch delta records for next run

defaultActivities.name: WB-SendNoDataEmail
defaultActivities.description: This activity sends an email to the teams group of high radius when the pipeline fails

activities.name: IF_DELETE_LAND_FILES
activities.description: Check for the valid land folder path and delete the files from land location

activities.name: SFDC_Data_Extract_01
activities.description: This activity is used to copy from Salesforce api to blob location

activities.name: SV-EXTRACT_STATUS_SUCCESS
activities.description: Set the EXECUTE_STATUS = 'SUCCESS' when the Record Count is > 0 and Execution Status is SUCCESS, else its set to 'FAILED'

activities.name: WB-SendFailureEmail01
activities.description: This activity sends an email to the teams group of high radius when the pipeline fails

activities.name: SFDC_Data_extract_success
activities.description: This activity logs success of  Get_Extract_Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: Sfdc_Data_Extract_Failure
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Get_Extract_Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: IS_DATA_Extracted
activities.description: It checks is data extracted or not

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of EP-SnowflakeIngestion activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivityFailed01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs failure of IF_SnowflakeIngestion activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivitySuccess02
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of EP-DBT_Processing activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-ActivityFailed05
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs failure of EP-DBT_Processing activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

ifTrueActivities.name: EP-DBT_Processing
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity will start the DBT processing of the comscore models

activities.name: Fetch_Metadata_Failure
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Fetch_metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Fetch_Metadata_Success
activities.description: This activity logs success of Fetch_metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Pipelinesuccesful_Salesforce_ca
activities.description: This Activity logs completion of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: WB-SendSuccessEmail
activities.description: It send SuccessMail

activities.name: SP-pipelineFailure_salesforce_ca
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Salesforce CA in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.
